name: Fading Light (RonanLG)
description:
Concept
The light crystals of the world have been corrupted by a greedy spirit that has lost its own spark.

The last spark will have brought to life two creatures who must help each other to cross a dark land to revive the crystals of light.

Context
Fading Light is a project creating during the 2022 Ubisoft Game Lab Competition.
